backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Help me set the agenda to review the progress of Project Alpha with the product and marketing team to get confirmation we are on track and discuss any blocking issues or risks.

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Intent
gutts.capability: Identify that the user wants to create an agenda for a progress review meeting
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the system understands the purpose of the request
gutts.evidence: Detects 'set the agenda' and 'review the progress of Project Alpha' as core intent

gutts.name: Identify Project Context
gutts.capability: Extract and confirm the project name and context from the prompt
gutts.user_goal: Associate the agenda with Project Alpha accurately
gutts.evidence: Recognizes 'Project Alpha' as the specific project under discussion

gutts.name: Determine Participants
gutts.capability: Identify required participants (product and marketing team) from the request
gutts.user_goal: Ensure correct stakeholders are considered for the meeting
gutts.evidence: Extracts 'product team' and 'marketing team' as participant groups

gutts.name: Retrieve Team Member Details
gutts.capability: Map identified teams to actual user contacts or calendar groups
gutts.user_goal: Translate team names into actionable participant lists
gutts.evidence: Queries organizational directory to find members of product and marketing teams

gutts.name: Define Agenda Objectives
gutts.capability: Extract and structure the meeting objectives from the user prompt
gutts.user_goal: Ensure agenda reflects all user-stated goals
gutts.evidence: Identifies objectives: review progress, confirm on-track status, discuss blocking issues/risks

gutts.name: Generate Agenda Items
gutts.capability: Convert objectives into actionable agenda items in logical order
gutts.user_goal: Provide a clear, organized agenda for the meeting
gutts.evidence: Creates items: 1) Progress review, 2) On-track confirmation, 3) Blocking issues and risks

gutts.name: Validate Agenda Completeness
gutts.capability: Check that all user-specified topics are included and no critical element is missing
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the agenda fully meets the stated purpose
gutts.evidence: Compares generated agenda items against extracted objectives

gutts.name: Present Agenda for Confirmation
gutts.capability: Display the proposed agenda to the user for approval or edits
gutts.user_goal: Allow user to confirm or adjust the agenda before finalization
gutts.evidence: Shows draft agenda in user interface with edit/approve options
